name: Homeward Round
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

SPACE: Jump

You are woman trying to get home during the end of the world. On your way you must collect as many of your pet animals as possible while the road behind you crumbles and falls down into the portal of hell. Use power ups such as tea, pizza and cake, to make the apocalypse slow down, the pet animals come towards you, and a 2x score multiplier, respectively. Watch out: someone left loads of obstacles in your way, running through them will slow you down so try to avoid them! Use the left and right arrow keys to move from side to side, and press space to jump! Aim to get through the door of your house with as many points as possible!

Created by:
